verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: said] [ARGM-TMP: Thursday] [ARG1: he thinks the summit is more about attitude and willpower than preparation]
President Trump said Thursday [ARG0: he] [V: thinks] [ARG1: the summit is more about attitude and willpower than preparation]
President Trump said Thursday he thinks [ARG1: the summit] [V: is] [ARG2: more about attitude and willpower than preparation]
